subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine, who won 305 games in a career that ended in 2008, has rejoined the Atlanta Braves as special assistant to the team president, John Schuerholz.
snippet: Tom Glavine, who won 305 games in a career that ended in 2008, has rejoined the Atlanta Braves as special assistant to the team president, John Schuerholz.
